zh-cn.logSummary:
0.4.0 2022.10.23 Phonograph Plus 更名一周年纪念版
一年前的今天，正式更名为Phonograph Plus，并发布了第一个版本v.0.0.1
  1. 翻译 清理各语言翻译
  2. 翻译 更新俄语（Photon Gilbert），土耳其语（Erdem Özdemir）
  3. 修复 导入数据库时偶尔出错
  4. 移除 黑名单
  5. 新增 “路径过滤器“, 支持"排除模式"(黑名单)和"仅包含模式"(白名单), 两者暂时无法同时使用
  6. 新增 全新的歌曲详情页面
  7. 新增 全新的更详细的更新对话框等
  8. 改进 菜单(几乎所有列表皆提供"播放","随机播放","下一个播放","加入列表"等)
  9. 开发 重构媒体读取
  10. 开发 引入 Jetpack Compose
  11. 其他 APK体积膨胀, 不再”小而美“

en.logSummary:
0.4.0 2022.10.23 Phonograph Plus 1st Renaming Anniversary Version
One year ago, first canonical stable Phonograph Plus versionv.0.0.1 was released.
  1. Translation: update Russian (by Photon Gilbert)，Turkish(by Erdem Özdemir)
  2. Translation: clean up translations for all language
  3. Fix: crash when importing databases
  4. Remove: Blacklist
  5. New: the Path filter, support "exclude mode" (blacklist) and "include mode" (whitelist),currently they can not be enabled at the same time
  6. New: Song Details Page
  7. New: brand new and detailed Upgrade Dialog and more
  8. Improve: menus (almost all lists provide "Play", "Shuffle Play", "Play Next","Add To Queues", etc.)
  9. Development: Refactor media reading
  10. Development: Introduce Jetpack Compose
  11. Other: APK is bloated, no longer "tiny but versatile"

logSummary: 请更新至新版本(至少高于v0.1.1), 此版本无法读取新更新日志 Update Please (as least to version v0.1.1)! This version can not be read this changelogs.
